translation.Message_0_Page_0: Thank you! I... Did you see something down there? WAIT, you seen HER? I thought I was the only one, everyone else thinks I'm crazy!
translation.Message_0_Page_1: She gave me a key for some reason, said it would be needed later, she didn't know why. I thought it was to the lighthouse but it didn't work.
translation.Message_0_Page_2: OH she gave you the key to the lighthouse? Well you should go! OH but first! I need help with one last thing.
translation.Message_0_Page_3: Could you deliver these invitations to the post office in Burywood? Once I'm done with this little project I will head over there and sort them out. But I just need them there.
